txt.en: 'Excellent! At least our bellies will be full for a while, and our moods lifted! That has to count for something, even with everything going on.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder].'
You've found Uzhún's salt pouch.\n\nThey wait for you at Kafagur.

'My salt! My dried sea-weed! I just brought the pouches here, I know I did. Unless I didn't?\n\n'Maybe they're still in the provisions barrels around Kafagur. I'll send Shulgolb to find the sea-weed -- you can look for my salt pouch.'
Search provision barrels for Uzhún's salt pouch
One final, tiny issue needs to be resolved before Uzhún and Shulgolb can get cooking.
Uzhún has asked you to search for their salt pouch.\n\nIt must be in one of the provision barrels around Kafagur.
